sense.gloss: to glare at, to scowl at, to glower at
to stare intensely at, to examine carefully
to estimate, to guess, to suspect, to judge
to keep an eye on someone (e.g. a suspicious or untrustworthy person), to watch
to take account of, to take into consideration

sdata.j: ↑審判↑↓しんぱん↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓をちらりと|↑睨↑↓にら↓む|が、↑審判↑↓しんぱん↓は↑涼↑↓すず↓しい↑顔↑↓かお↓して↑鼻↑↓はな↓クソをほじっていやがった。「ちくしょう、↑八百長↑↓やおちょう↓かよ・・・」
sdata.e: I glared briefly in the referee's direction but he was putting on a calm face while picking his nose. "Dammit, the fight's a fixup!?"

sdata.j: ↑吸血鬼↑↓きゅうけつき↓は|↑睨↑↓にら↓む|だけで↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑金縛↑↓かなしば↓りにする。
sdata.e: A vampire can paralyze people just by looking at them.
